Package de.lmu.dbs.jforest.core

Class de.lmu.dbs.jforest.core.Feature extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

Serialized Fields

threshold

double threshold
Threshold to compare to the feature functions output value.

Class de.lmu.dbs.jforest.core.ForestParameters extends ParamLoader implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

Serialized Fields

logWinnerThresholdCandidates

boolean logWinnerThresholdCandidates

logFeatureCandidates

boolean logFeatureCandidates

forestSize

int forestSize
Number of trees in the forest during training

maxDepth

int maxDepth
Max depth of tree growing

percentageOfRandomValuesPerFrame

double percentageOfRandomValuesPerFrame
For each data frame, this represents the percentage of the values to be picked initially by the training algorithm of the trees.

numOfRandomFeatures

int numOfRandomFeatures
This is the number of randomly generated feature parameter sets for each node in training.

thresholdCandidatesPerFeature

int thresholdCandidatesPerFeature
This is the number of randomly picked threshold candidates generated for each feature parameter set

featureFactory

Feature featureFactory
This is a plain feature instance that later is used to generate the training features with the getRandomFeatureSet method. It is never used for classification itself, just as a factory.

entropyThreshold

double entropyThreshold
Threshold for information gain of the winner feature in growing a node. If info gain is below entropyThreshold, the node will become a leaf. Values below zero will disable the threshold and calculate all nodes down to maxDepth.

logProgress

boolean logProgress
Show little progress info while growing.

logNodeInfo

boolean logNodeInfo
Show more details for each node growed on the console.

saveGainThresholdDiagrams

int saveGainThresholdDiagrams
Save a gains/thresholds diagram in a png file for each nodeÂ´s winner feature, up to the given depth. Use -1 to save all nodes.

saveNodeClassifications

int saveNodeClassifications
Save classifications for each node after clasification run, up to the given depth Use -1 to save all nodes.

debugFolder

java.lang.String debugFolder
Folder where the extra debugging file go. You have to set this manually before starting training.

Class de.lmu.dbs.jforest.core.Node extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 2L

Serialized Fields

id

long id
Individual (ascending) node id (just for debugging)

feature

Feature feature
The feature which classifies the node branches

left

Node left
Left branch node

right

Node right
Right branch node

probabilities

float[] probabilities
If the node is a leaf, the probabilities for each class are stored here.

debugObject

java.lang.Object debugObject
Object for debugging. Can be used to attach any data to the node, i.e. the classification.
